recordTypes.name: Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description:
A zoning certificate is a document issued by the zoning enforcement officer stating that a use, building, or lot complies with the zoning ordinance, is legally nonconforming, or is authorized by a variance or special use permit. (R.I. Gen. Laws ยง 45-24-31(65)). The fee for the certificate is $25. 
Please note that if you are asking for a determination about whether a proposed use would be permitted, you must ask for a zoning determination.
